card.name: Rage
card.description: Give an ally monster +1/+1, then deal its {{ATK}} as {{DMG}} to the monster in front of it.

description.now: Give an ally monster +1/+1, then deal its {{ATK}} as {{DMG}} to the monster in front of it.
description.prev: Deal selected ally monster's {{ATK}} as {{DMG}} to the monster in front of it and extra {{DMG}} to its owner (max: 6).
